Notification Headline

This section will notify field team members of any updates related to access/coverage that may have an impact on their discussions with customers.

Notifications can be tailored to be HCP-, product-, or region-specific and should follow standard approval processes prior to publishing from this platform.

Notification Headline

This section will notify field team members of any updates related to access/coverage that may have an impact on their discussions with customers.

Notifications can be tailored to be HCP-, product-, or region-specific and should follow standard approval processes prior to publishing from this platform.

{{userName}}

Your saved templates

EXIT TUTORIAL

HOW-TO GUIDE

Setting up
your meeting

To begin, select the brand(s) you
want to include in your customer
presentation. When you click
“CONTINUE”, it will take you to the
Control Center.

Please note that you can select a
single product or a combination of
products; however, you cannot use
GAMMAGARD LIQUID in
combination with CUVITRU or
HYQVIA at this time.

HOW-TO GUIDE

Editing your
presentation

Within the Control Center, you can create
your own unique presentation by
modifying the following fields: Product,
Channel, Benefit Type, and Access.

If you select “Include top plans” under
Access, a slide is added to your
presentation that you can further modify
by selecting “Customize Top Plans”.

When you’re done customizing your
presentation, click “PRESENT” to launch
it or “SAVE AS” to add it to your saved
templates for a future use.

HOW-TO GUIDE

Saved
templates

You can prepare for meetings by
saving custom presentations to reuse
in the future. Saved presentations can
be reused, edited, deleted, or renamed
at any time.

Click the heart icon to save favorite
presentations. Your favorites will
appear at the top of your list so they
are easier to find.

Welcome.

Please select a customer to set up your
personalized access and coverage conversation
